item.description:
SEMPO Boston in partnership with The Boston Area Search Engine Marketing Group (BASEM), Search Engine Marketing New England (SEMNE), and the BostonSEO.org Meetup

Present a Boston SEM Community “Mega-Event”
…An Evening of Fun, Networking & Discussion
Sponsored by

Search Engine Strategies Conference & Expo

and

Onward Search

6:30 – 9:30 p.m., Monday, June 22, 2009
At the Private-Members-Only Foundation Room
At the House of Blues, 15 Lansdowne Street, Boston
(RSVP Required though the link below. MeetUp RSVP will not work for the event.)
TO RSVP Click Here

Featuring:
Free Drink Ticket for Each Attendee (cash bar thereafter)
Hors D' Oeuvres
Welcoming Comments by Partner Organizations
Welcoming Comments by Incisive Media
Solicitation of Topics for Future Events

Don’t miss this first-ever event that brings together members of Boston’s 4 biggest search engine marketing communities for an evening of networking and fun with your search marketing peers and colleagues. Looking to meet people and make new contacts in the industry? Looking to learn more about search? Looking for a job? Looking for employees? Then this is the must-attend event for you.

Note:

• Attire is business casual (Foundation Room does not allow sneakers or T-shirts)
• Use the double yellow doors on Lansdowne Street marked “Foundation Room”
• Parking is available at the Lansdowne Street Garage for $15
• Kenmore T-stop is a 5-minute walk

RSVP is Required and Space is Limited – Only Names on the Guest List Will Be Admitted TO RSVP CLICK HERE
item.how_to_find_us: Use the double yellow doors on Lansdowne Street marked “Foundation Room”
item.name: Boston SEM Community "Mega-Event"
